Guys, follow this to run.
I tested a few minutes ago in Win7 X86 and worked!

1 - Control Panel -> Clock, Language and Region, Change Region, select "Administrative", click button "Change System Locale", change to "Japan(Japanese)".
2 - Restart PC
3 - Mount de ISO with 2.2GB
4 - Go to drive mounted, navigate to X:\setup and run the "ILLUSIONxxxx.msi", the game will installed (few minutes)
5 - Go to folder "NO DVD", copy the "RealKanojo(NoDVD).exe" to C:\Illusion\xxx\ (remember, the path can different if you choose alternative path.
6 - Run the RealKanojo.exe

Theres an easier way to install rather than using Applocale.

Mount the image and open up the DVD folder. Open setup folder and run the file that ends in .MSI and it will install on any language windows.

LazyAmerican:

The English patch comes as a .exe file.  Simply run that file and it will install all the English translations for you.  You said you ran the registry tool so your installation directory should be in English characters already and the .exe should work fine.

Quite curious about this, since it's an Illusion game, but where the heck is the famous NoDVD patch I keep hearing about? Not on the .iso/.mds files, thats for sure, and the .rar's didnt have any either.

1: get aplocal, make your comp think its gone japanese.
2: install game by clicking the same buttons youd click for an english installer (come on, all windows install wizards are setup the same. language makes no diffrence!) - if your really that bad you cant get through it, there are english installers out there. search for Real Kanojo Mods on google

3: is where you'll have to decide. dedicated perv, or part time fapper?
dedicated pervs will want to look for a translation mod, of which there are dozens. go to Hongfire once you have the iso, and they'll have every mod under the sun. 
if your just looking to releave some tension, go search for a save file, and play the game in japanese. grope around till you find the load screen and enjoy.

4: stock up on tissues, hand lotion, and plenty of elecrolytes.
